General.Name: Montebalito S.A
General.Description: Montebalito, S.A. engages in the real estate business in Spain and internationally. The company was incorporated in 1972 and is based in Madrid, Spain. Montebalito, S.A. is a subsidiary of Metambiente, S.A.
General.Address: Calle María de Molina, 39, Madrid, Spain, 28006
